body_html:
Thanks to @ezyang !
Though the same problem happened again on a brand new iMac, and I am pretty sure that all three points mentioned by you above are checked.
I hope there would be some solution when there are newer version cuDNN available for macOS.

@Noirai The good news is that we can still use CUDA on Ubuntu, and I am trying to install Ubuntu.

Thank you guys for your amazing work!

body:
Thanks to @ezyang !
Though the same problem happened again on a brand new iMac, and I am pretty sure that all three points mentioned by you above are checked.
I hope there would be some solution when there are newer version cuDNN available for macOS.


@Noirai  The good news is that we can still use CUDA on Ubuntu, and I am trying to install Ubuntu.

Thank you guys for your amazing work!
